# R: Basic Operations

## Homework

1.  Create two strings with your first and last name, respectively. Then concatenate them, and print the new value as "My name is \<your newly created concatenated variable will go here\>"

    ```{r}
    first <- 'Leo'
    last <- 'Ashcraft'
    name <- paste(first, last)
    cat("My name is", name)
    ```
